description: Disk space used by the database
title: Database size

targets.legendFormat: No. of times clean stopped due to writing too many buffers

targets.rawSql:
WITH
  minutes AS (
    SELECT
      TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(UNIX_SECONDS('2024-07-01') + sequence * 60) AS timestamp_minute
    FROM
      UNNEST (
        GENERATE_ARRAY(
          0,
          TIMESTAMP_DIFF(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), '2024-07-01', MINUTE)
        )
      ) AS sequence
  ),
  project_requests AS (
    SELECT
      timestamp_minute,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 200 AND 299, requests, 0)) AS status_code_2xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 300 AND 399, requests, 0)) AS status_code_3xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 400 AND 499, requests, 0)) AS status_code_4xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 500 AND 599, requests, 0)) AS status_code_5xx
    FROM
      `supabase-etl-prod-eu.raw_infra.cloudflare_logs_status_codes_materialized`
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(timestamp_minute)
      AND ref = '$project'
      AND request_type = 'auth'
    GROUP BY
      timestamp_minute
  )
SELECT
  timestamp_minute,
  COALESCE(status_code_2xx, 0) AS status_code_2xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_3xx, 0) AS status_code_3xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_4xx, 0) AS status_code_4xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_5xx, 0) AS status_code_5xx
FROM
  minutes
  LEFT JOIN project_requests USING (timestamp_minute)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_minute)
ORDER BY
  timestamp_minute

WITH
  minutes AS (
    SELECT
      TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(UNIX_SECONDS('2024-07-01') + sequence * 60) AS timestamp_minute
    FROM
      UNNEST (
        GENERATE_ARRAY(
          0,
          TIMESTAMP_DIFF(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), '2024-07-01', MINUTE)
        )
      ) AS sequence
  ),
  project_requests AS (
    SELECT
      timestamp_minute,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 200 AND 299, requests, 0)) AS status_code_2xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 300 AND 399, requests, 0)) AS status_code_3xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 400 AND 499, requests, 0)) AS status_code_4xx,
      SUM(IF(status_code BETWEEN 500 AND 599, requests, 0)) AS status_code_5xx
    FROM
      `supabase-etl-prod-eu.raw_infra.cloudflare_logs_status_codes_materialized`
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(timestamp_minute)
      AND ref = '$project'
      AND request_type = 'rest'
    GROUP BY
      timestamp_minute
  )
SELECT
  timestamp_minute,
  COALESCE(status_code_2xx, 0) AS status_code_2xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_3xx, 0) AS status_code_3xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_4xx, 0) AS status_code_4xx,
  COALESCE(status_code_5xx, 0) AS status_code_5xx
FROM
  minutes
  LEFT JOIN project_requests USING (timestamp_minute)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_minute)
ORDER BY
  timestamp_minute
